statements: SELECT * FROM FundraisingCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM FundraisingCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, funding_goal FROM FundraisingCampaigns WHERE funding_goal > 5000;
SELECT campaign_name FROM FundraisingCampaigns WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT campaign_id, amount_raised FROM FundraisingCampaigns ORDER BY amount_raised DESC;
SELECT * FROM FundraisingCampaigns WHERE funding_goal > amount_raised ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT campaign_name, funding_goal FROM FundraisingCampaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' AND amount_raised > 5000 ORDER BY funding_goal DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM FundraisingCampaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM FundraisingCampaigns WHERE amount_raised < funding_goal AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, funding_goal, amount_raised FROM FundraisingCampaigns WHERE amount_raised > (0.5 * funding_goal) ORDER BY amount_raised DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns;
SELECT * FROM Donations;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM Donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM Donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM Donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM Donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns LEFT JOIN Donations ON Campaigns.campaign_id = Donations.campaign_id WHERE donation_amount IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM FundraisingCampaigns WHERE total_amount_raised > 5000
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, total_amount_raised FROM FundraisingCampaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT campaign_name, total_donors FROM FundraisingCampaigns ORDER BY total_donors DESC
SELECT donor_name, email, phone_number FROM Donors WHERE donor_id = 3
SELECT * FROM CampaignAnalytics WHERE total_donations < 1000
SELECT campaign_name, total_amount_raised FROM FundraisingCampaigns ORDER BY total_amount_raised DESC
SELECT donor_name, email, phone_number FROM Donors WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT campaign_name, total_donors FROM FundraisingCampaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT AVG(average_donation_amount), MAX(most_common_donation_amount) FROM CampaignAnalytics
SELECT * FROM FundraisingCampaigns JOIN Donors ON FundraisingCampaigns.campaign_id = Donors.donor_id
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE total_funds_raised > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM Donors WHERE donation_amount >= 500;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, total_funds_raised FROM Campaigns ORDER BY total_funds_raised DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_content FROM Reports WHERE campaign_id = 2;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM Donors ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_funds_raised FROM Campaigns WHERE total_funds_raised > 10000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM Donors WHERE donation_amount >= 500 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT report_content, report_date FROM Reports ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM Campaigns;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM Donations ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT donor_name, email, phone_number FROM Donors;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM Donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 AND donation_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, email FROM Donors WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' AND email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT report_date, total_donations FROM Reports INNER JOIN Campaigns ON Reports.campaign_id = Campaigns.campaign_id WHERE Campaigns.budget > 5000 ORDER BY total_donations DESC;
